name: Brick Blast
description:
Aim and smash blocks with the ghost ball!

The ball only hits blocks of the same color and ignores the others.

The rules are easy:
1. Ball hits blocks of the same color
2. Falling blocks hit blocks of the same color.
3. If blocks are not connected to other blocks vertically or horizontally they fall down

Destroy all bricks and became the Brick Blaster.

This game is a new, satisfying zen arkanoid inspired by best arcade games!

NO ADS. NO IAP. JUST FUN

Features:
One Tap Controls
Quick but Challenging Levels
Juicy Visuals
Unlimited gameplay
Optimized Battery Consumption
Flawless Animations
Zen visuals change as you advance.

WARNING! Extremely ADDICTING!
